contentList.content:
Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you are Prone, standing up uses only [1] of your movement speed.
Your Jump distance also increases by [1].

When you are Prone, standing up uses only [1] of your movement speed.
Your Jump distance is increased by [1].

Skilled at mimicry and dramatics, you gain the following benefits:
- your Charisma increases by [1], to a maximum of [2].
- you have an advantage on Deception and Performance Checks.
The number of times you can use your warding flare's reaction. It is equal to your Wisdom modifier.

The armor reduces the wearer’s Movement speed by [1] unless the wearer has a Strength score equal to or higher than [2].
This effect is not applied if you are encumbered.
Carrying too much weight. <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is reduced by [1].

Carrying far too much weight. <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> heavily reduced by [1], and you can no longer run. You also have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, as well as Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
